title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 153 - Sale And Analysis Of Commercial Fertilizer
content:

§ 153.1 - Definitions and terms; exemptions
§ 153.2 - Plant nutrients in addition to nitrogen, phosphate and potash
§ 153.3 - Specialty fertilizer label requirements
§ 153.4 - Licensing period
§ 153.5 - Method of sampling and analysis

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 153

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§18, 146-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
